Lennert : Sorry, cannot help you with the Keyboard Stuff, maybe one of your Scandinavian mates can help you there. im pretty sure that using your special characters in the FatX File System the Xbox uses will not be possible. Also FatX only allows 32 chars in length which is bad for mp3s, too. There are some automatic FatX Renamer programs out there. Look for them on xbox-scene.com
